title: Nitrogen-based fertilizers often lead to hypoxia

content.question: The use of nitrogen-based fertilizers in the Midwestern United States is a major contributing factor to which of the following?

choices.label: Spread of the West Nile virus
Hypoxia in the Gulf of Mexico
Water shortages in communities near the Great Lakes
The increase in severe storms in the Southeastern United States

content.answer: Hypoxia in the Gulf of Mexico

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
